Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

A <1px vertical line down the right hand side of images the same color as background.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.  Load test case.
2.  Resize Window (may be optional)
Actual Results:  
It appears the background color is leaking through the image border on the right hand side.  This appears to be only at some window sizes, so depends on where the image ends up on the screen.  I have included a few images in the test case so it is more likely one of them will exhibit the behavior.  If they don't, try resizing the window.

The bug will appear as a 1px (maybe less than 1px) red vertical line down the right hand side of the image between the image itself and the image border.

I have had a few people try it and it appears to be unique to Firefox 3 and Firefox 4 on the MacOSX platform only.  Win7 and Linux users do not report this behavior.

Expected Results:  
No line.
